extendedInfo.description: SlickViewer, a simple and elegant widget to shop Slickdeals' front-page deals!View the most recent front-page deals easily right on your home screen.  Easy to use, all it takes is a single click on a deal! Provides a compact view for every deal, including the preview image.Features:+ instant notifications for new deals+ automatic refresh when a new deal comes out+ manual refreshHow to install:- Go to your home screen, then tap and hold on an empty spot- Select Widgets- Find SlickViewer!Settings (Wrench icon):* Status Update - Notifies when a new update is available* Auto-Refresh - Refresh automatically when a new update is availableIf you have any questions, ideas, or suggestions, please feel free to send me an email.SlickViewer is not affiliated with slickdeals.net.

reviews.title: Slickdeals widget
reviews.comment: This widget is really useful for those that are addicted to slickdeals. I used to only check when I\'m by a computer, but now it\'s actively refreshing on my home page. I love that it is transparent. I\'ll never miss a good deal!   Note for some people: I had to reboot my phone for it to show on my widget list.
reviews.author: Joe Kuang

reviews.title: Manually updating is a pain
reviews.comment: The update button is too small. I would like to drag down the viewer so that it updates similar to many other apps.
reviews.author: Patrick Ho

reviews.title: Deals all day, everyday! Awesome widget!
reviews.comment: Best wiget to keep track of all of the best deals on slickdeals. Easy and simple to use. Wonderful widget, would recommend it to anyone. ^^
reviews.author: Edmond Xu

reviews.title: Fun widget to keep on homescreen
reviews.comment: Great app with good product images. Really convenient way to do some anti-stress shopping during study breaks!
reviews.author: Shelley Phoun

reviews.title: User
reviews.comment: I like it ! Get update so easy and won\'t miss any updated good deals. Great app ! Everyone should download.
reviews.author: Vincent Yan

reviews.title: Amazing App
reviews.comment: First of its kind! There is no android SD app and this works amazingly well. Nice.
reviews.author: Max Xu
